aboutNote: Abra is a general customer service application, it allows you to contact customer service agents from different companies, as well as manage your technical support, tickets, case or situation, we provide a quality and speed service, without bots or automatic messages.
aboutNote2: We prioritize your attention to your case quickly and effectively, responding almost instantly to your support request, also the resolution of this and of course, always listening to the customer, so that this has the best experience.
